about_the_game:
In this romance visual novel, step into the shoes of the necromancer, Raenelle, whose wish for a break from work was granted in the most unexpected way possible — the sudden disappearance of the spirits of the deceased. Meet a colorful cast of characters, fail to summon the spirits of the dead, unravel mysteries, and maybe — just maybe — fall in love.



Raenelle Talisko, a necromancer stuck in a dead-end job that revolves around reanimating corpses of the recently deceased to help them fulfill their final wishes, is desperate for a transfer to stave off the existential dread and burn out.

But when an unknown catastrophe befalls the kingdom, preventing necromancers from being able to call upon spirits, much more may be at stake than her career as Raenelle rushes to figure out why the last spirit she summoned is still lingering around despite all logical comprehension...


The following are projected features for the full game.
  • Pursue and fall in love with 5 interesting characters, each with their own self-contained route
  • Experience a branching narrative that totals at an estimate of 650,000+ words
  • Discover your fate among the 40 possible endings
  • Escape to a rich fantasy world full of magic — and secrets — illustrated by 35+ detailed backgrounds
  • Meet over 15 supporting characters who will play a role in your journey
  • Enjoy key romantic moments with 25 beautifully drawn CGs
  • Hear the cast of 6 main characters come to life, partially voiced by a team of talented voice actors
  • Immerse yourself in the atmosphere, enhanced by an original soundtrack of over 15 background music tracks

This current demo only contains the first 3 chapters of the game covering the common route.
